golad.bot

Interface BotFactory<E extends Bot>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - The type of Bot generated by this BotFactory.

    public interface BotFactory<E extends Bot>
    A BotFactory is used to create the instances of Bot used to represent GOLAD players.
    Author:
    Megacrafter127
    See Also:
    Bot

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      E createBot(String opponentName, String opponentVersion, String opponentAuthor, int boardWidth, int boardHeight, int initialCellCount, CellState ownColor)
      Returns a Bot ready to participate in the described GOLAD game.
      String getAuthor()
      Returns the name of the author of the Bots created by this BotFactory.
      String getName()
      Returns the name of the Bots created by this BotFactory, or "Human" if the created Bots are human interfaces.
      String getVersion()
      Returns the version of the Bots created by this BotFactory.

    • Method Detail

      • createBot

        E createBot(String opponentName,
          String opponentVersion,
          String opponentAuthor,
          int boardWidth,
          int boardHeight,
          int initialCellCount,
          CellState ownColor)
        Returns a Bot ready to participate in the described GOLAD game. Can return a previously returned instance, if said instance is guaranteed to be in a state in which it can play GOLAD.
        Parameters:
        opponentName - The name of the opponent Bot
        opponentVersion - The version of the opponent Bot
        opponentAuthor - The author of the opponent Bot
        boardWidth - The width of the Board
        boardHeight - The height of the Board
        initialCellCount - The number of cells each player starts out with
        ownColor - The color of the cells controlled by this player
        Returns:
        a Bot ready to participate in a GOLAD game.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the name of the Bots created by this BotFactory, or "Human" if the created Bots are human interfaces.
        Returns:
        the name of the Bots

      • getAuthor

        String getAuthor()
        Returns the name of the author of the Bots created by this BotFactory.
        Returns:
        the name of the author

      • getVersion

        String getVersion()
        Returns the version of the Bots created by this BotFactory.
        Returns:
        the version of the Bots
